item.title: 3.7.3 Copying Backups to Another Region
item.description: 3.7.3 Copying Backup to Another Region Block Volume backup is only possible within a single Region. If it is needed in another region for disaster recovery or other purposes, it can be copied to another region through the inter-region copy function. Constraints Cross-region backup copies have some limitations. See the official documentation for exact details. Limitations for Copying Volume Backups Across Regions Open the navigation menu in the OCI console. Go to Storage > Block Storage > Block Volumes Backups.

item.title: 3.7.4 Backing up Policy-Based Block Volumes
item.description: 3.7.4 Backing up policy-based block volumes Volume Backup Policies Bronze Policy Monthly - Monthly incremental backups run on the first day of each month. It is maintained for 12 months. Every year - A full backup is executed on January 1st of each year. It is maintained for 5 years. Silver Policy Weekly - Weekly incremental backups run every Sunday. It is preserved for 4 weeks. Monthly - Monthly incremental backups run on the first day of each month.
